page.job_title: Investment Banking, Summer Analyst, Dubai (Europe, Middle East and Africa)
page.job_description: Youre the brains behind our work. Youre ready to bring your knowledge from the classroom to the boardroom and Citi wants to help you get there. Whether its honing your skills or building your network, we know that success cant come without growth. Our programs equip you with the knowledge and training you need to play a valuable role on your team and establish a long-term career here. At Citi, we value internal mobility and career growth is not a question of if, but when. Citis Institutional Clients Group (ICG) is looking for Summer Analysts to join the Investment Banking team in Dubai. The Investment Banking group advises corporate clients who want to raise funds in capital markets and who need strategic support in financial transactions. Initiatives you may be working on with clients include mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, financial restructurings, underwriting and distributing equity, debt and derivative securities. If none of these terms make sense right now, thats ok! Our internship is designed to help you increase your knowledge, so whatever your degree is in we will give you the training and support you need to excel. Your time here will look something like this... * Collect and analyze company information to assist transactions, including conducting industry research, revising and organizing financial data * Analyze financial data and develop financial models including company valuations, discounted cash flow analysis, financing and comparative analyses * Create and finalize new business development presentations * Coordinate tasks with internal and external working team * Prepare required internal documentation e.g. control and compliance regulations We provide you with the knowledge and skills you need to succeed. Were committed to teaching you the ropes. The ten week Summer Analyst program starts in June and begins with a one week training program in London. After which youll join the Dubai team where youll focus on financial analysis and business development. Top performing Summer Analysts mayreturn to Citi after graduation to work as a full-time Analyst. We want to hear from you if... * You are in your penultimate/final year of university and pursuing a degree in any discipline * You have strong academics * You are fluent in English - Arabic or another MENA region language is an added advantage Who we think will be a great fit... We’re looking for motivated individuals, who are eager to start their careers at a global organization, tend to think globally, and have an innovative outlook on business. We know that anyone—not just those with business degrees—can have a knack for business, so we’re open to all disciplines. We value diversity and so do you. We’ll also be looking for the following: * Desire to develop a deep understanding of the financial industry * Intellectual curiosity and proactive approach to searching for new and creative ideas * Strong communication, planning, and organizational skills * Commitment to personal growth and career development including mobility and flexibility. You also have a strong desire to learn, are proactive, building rapport and relationships in team environments * Unquestioned commitment to integrity and ethical decision-making * Interest in business We recruit on a rolling basis and encourage you to apply as soon as possible. Applications will close on 7th December. We will begin to review applications before the deadline and therefore encourage you to apply as soon as possible. Successful candidates will be offered a competitive salary. Before you apply have you visited our [1] Career Inspiration Page? Head over to learn more about life at Citi, ask a question or get handy tips from the previous Q&A Citi is an Equal Opportunities Employer References Visible links 1.

page.job_title: Guest Relations Officer (Arabic, German or Russian Speakers)
page.job_description: A Guest Relations Officer engages with our Guests throughout the entire hospitality experience. From check-in to check-out, the Guest Relations Officer is always prepared to respond to Guest requests at concierge, during promotional activities, and more. What will I be doing? As a Guest Relations Officer, you will serve on the Front Office Team which is the main connection between the Guest, the hotel, and the various hotel departments. A Guest Relations Officer truly influences the first impressions of our Guests and, therefore, is responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards: Check the guest arrival reports in advance of Guest check-in and coordinate with Housekeeping on room allocations for guests Be responsible for special room assignments and suite occupancies Welcome and fulfill the check-in process of Guests Ensure all rooms meet the highest quality standards and include all requested amenities before Guest arrival Manage the Guest Relations Desk in the hotel lobby Serve as the main point of contact for guests and ensure hotel departments are fully briefed on Guest requirements Maintain the inventory of Guest amenities Maintain current knowledge of hotel products, services, pricing and special promotional offers, as well as daily VIP and special events

page.job_title: Sous Chef for the Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Centre
page.job_description: A Sous Chef for the Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Centre will work closely with the Executive Chef to manage all aspects of the kitchen to deliver an excellent Guest and Member experience while managing food provisions, assisting with guest queries, and controlling costs. What will I be doing? A Sous Chef for the Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Centre,  will work closely with the Executive Chef to manage aspects of the kitchen to deliver an excellent Guest and Member experience. A Sous Chef will also be required to manage food provisions, assist with guest queries, and control costs. Specifically, you will be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards: Manage all aspects of the kitchen including operational, quality and administrative functions Manage the provision of food to Food and Beverage outlets and taking action where necessary to ensure compliance with current legislation Assist in positive outcomes from guest queries in a timely and efficient manner Ensure food stuffs are of a good quality and stored correctly Contribute to menu creation by responding and incorporating Guest feedback Ensure the consistent production of high quality food through all hotel food outlets Manage customer relations when necessary, in the absence of the Executive Chef Ensure resources support the business needs through the effective management of working rotations Support brand standards through the training and assessment of the Team Manage the kitchen brigade effectively to ensure a well-organized, motivated Team Control costs without compromising standards, improving gross profit margins and other departmental and financial targets Assist other departments wherever necessary and maintain good working relationships Comply with hotel security, fire regulations and all health and safety and food safety legislation Report maintenance, hygiene and hazard issues Be environmentally aware

A Fitness Instructor is responsible for conducting fitness programs and assessments to deliver an excellent Guest and Member experience while promoting the facilities and ensuring compliance with health and safety regulations. What will I be doing? As a Fitness Instructor, you are responsible for conducting fitness programs and assessments to deliver an excellent Guest and Member experience. A Fitness Instructor will also be required to schedule adequate staff coverage. Specifically, you will be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards: Carry out fitness assessments on members as required Conduct fitness programmes and inductions Understand and advise members and guests on the correct usage of gym equipment Ensure adequate coverage of the pool, gym and reception Carry out regular pool tests Maintain cleanliness of reception, changing rooms, pool side and gym facilities Adhere to all health and safety regulations Promote the facilities to hotel residents and perspective members

page.job_title: Night Manager for the Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Centre
page.job_description: A Night Manager for the Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Centre oversees the night-hour supervision of the Front Office Team to ensure that Team Members are prepared and well-informed to deliver our Guests an exceptional experience from check-in through check-out. What will I be doing? As Night Manager for the Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Centre, you will oversee the night-hour supervision of the Front Office Team to ensure that Team Members are prepared and well-informed to deliver our Guests an exceptional experience from check-in through check-out. A Night Manager is responsible for managing the first impressions of our Guests and, therefore, must perform the following tasks to the highest standards: Oversee the entire Front Office operation to maintain high standards Serve as a point of contact for regular and VIP Guests Complete Night Audit duties Maximise room occupancy at best rates and use up-selling techniques to promote hotel services and facilities Understand and demonstrate correct procedures regarding the acceptance of foreign currencies, credit cards and cash in accordance with the hotel credit policy Represent the Hotel Manager and other senior managers in their absence, taking full responsibility of the hotel Manage, record and promptly resolve issues or emergencies that arise Demonstrate current knowledge of hotel products, services, pricing and policies, as well as knowledge of the local area Act in accordance with all security and emergency procedures and manage the instigation of these, as required Compile adequate handover to Early staff / Duty Manager Attend appropriate training courses, when required, and assist with the Night Teams training and development efforts Act in accordance with policies and procedures when working with front of house equipment and property management systems Conduct annual and mid-year Appraisals with Team Members Conduct Health and Safety Checks and Night Walks, and maintain a good status awareness of all hotel areas Assist other departments, as necessary

page.job_title: Guest Service Agent (Doubletree by Hilton Downtown Houston)
page.job_description: A Guest Services Agent is responsible for greeting and registering guests and checking guests out of the hotel in the hotels continuing effort to deliver outstanding guest service and financial profitability. What will I be doing? As a Guest Services Agent, you would be responsible for greeting and registering guests and checking guests out of the hotel in the hotels continuing effort to deliver outstanding guest service and financial profitability. Specifically, you would be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards: Greet guests and complete the registration process to include, but not limited to, inputting and retrieving information from the computer, confirmation of guest information and room rate, selection of rooms, coding electronic keys, promoting marketing programs, providing a welcome packet and ensuring guest knows location of room and/or has a bell person accompany him/her ?Assist guests with check-out including, but not limited to, ensuring rooms and services are correctly accounted, using the point-of-sale system, handling money, processing credit and debit cards, accepting and recording various forms of payment, converting foreign currency, making change and processing gift certificates and cards Demonstrate a thorough knowledge of hotel information including, but not limited to, room categories, room rates, packages, promotions, the local area and other general product knowledge and answer guest questions and inquiries ?Use up-selling techniques to promote hotel services and facilities and to maximize room occupancy Respond to guest inquiries and requests and resolve issues in a timely, friendly and efficient manner Field guest complaints, conduct research and resolve and negotiate solutions for guest satisfaction Receive, input, retrieve and relay messages to guests

Description Amaris is an independent, international Technologies and Management Consulting Group. Created in, Amaris is already established in over countries and supports more than clients worldwide throughout their projects lifecycle. Our expertise covers five areas of innovation: Business and Management, Information Technologies, Engineering and High Technologies, Telecommunications and Biotech and Pharma. With more than offices across the world, the Group offers proximity support to its clients in all their locations and many opportunities of international careers for employees. In, Amarisaims to reacha turnover of million euros, employees and to develop its workforces with the anticipation of a further new job openings. We expect to triple our workforce within the next few years and reach a leading international position in independent consulting. Your Role The Training Manager is responsible for developing and implementing comprehensive training programs forthe IT Department of Amaris Group. 1. Create and Supervise the Training team to include selection, training and development, coaching, counseling and performance management. 2. Work cross-functionally to plan, organize, design, develop, communicate and implement training-related programs that ensure clarity of message, define actionable items and outline expected business results. 3. Determine the most effective training vehicle for each training-related intervention and ensure that adult learning principles are consistently applied. 4. Facilitate the design and development of new training programs, training tools and aids. 5. Review and evaluate the effectiveness of training-related initiatives based upon business results, internal client feedback and/or quantitative measures such as training evaluations or knowledge/skill tests. 6. Review and integrate external training materials/resourced for internal use where we can leverage vendor-related support or negotiate with outside training vendors. 7. Conduct train-the-trainer sessions for the field, Business Unit and Home Office Leadership Team on new and existing programs to ensure consistency in content/message across all markets. This person do NOT need to be IT Technical:he will be in charge to identify technical guys& to train them to be uirements -Minimum 5 years of experience in related field. IT internal Product preferred. -Bachelors degree/Master degree preferred -Relies on extensive experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals. -Successfully demonstrate experience in developing and executing training programs. -Technical skills including: IT mindset, IT vocabulary & Software development organization/methods (no need to be a technical expert) -Strong organizational skills with ability to effectively plan and execute multiple events simultaneously -Detail oriented and skilled at managing projects in complex environments (international, timezone, multi-cultures, from Junior to Expert profiles) -Ability to collaborate and build successful partnerships with various constituents -Exemplary verbal, written and interpersonal skills -Confidentiality and discretion

page.job_title: HSE Engineer (Jeddah & Medina ) Open to all nationalities
page.job_description: Responsible for safety operations in all the scope of the train and ground operations ensuring Emergency and Recovery Plans are aligned. Inspecting workplaces to ensure compliance with safety standards are called occupational health and safety (OHS) specialists. They are also known as safety and health professionals, or OHS inspectors, in addition, making sure everything is safe and in good working order, OHS specialists suggest upgrades and alterations to equipment and systems. They conduct training sessions regarding health and safety for managers and employees. Responsabilities:  Execute and ensure Safety plans in the workplace according to legal and company guidelines.  Enforce policies and culture of health and safety.  Evaluate practices, procedures and facilities to assess risk and adherence to the law.  Conduct training and presentations for health and safety matters and accident prevention.  Monitor compliance to policies and laws by inspecting employees and operations.  Inspect equipment and machinery to observe possible unsafe conditions.  Participate in accidents or incidents investigation to discover causes and mitigate its repetition in the future.  Recommend solutions to issues, improvement opportunities or new prevention measures.  Report on health and safety awareness, issues and statistics.  Execute Crisis Management Plans from the safety point of view in case of need.

Primary Location: India,Tamil Nadu,Chennai Education: Bachelors Degree Job Function: Operations Schedule: Full-time Shift: Variable Employee Status: Regular Travel Time: No Job ID: Description Function Overview The Global Reconciliation Utility in Chennai is approximately FTE strong and provides Cash, Stock and Sub-system reconciliation to over Legal Vehicles across over countries around the globe. The GRU is a truly global and product agnostic, market agnostic and business agnostic set up. The unit provides highly critical support to all of ICG businesses across EMEA, NAM and India, where delays or failures or any issues in reconciliation could lead to financial, client and regulatory impact for Citi as a whole. Some of the regulatory requirements have very tight deadlines on a daily basis, especially the CASS client money rules laid down by the UK regulator, FCA. GRU reconciles over, cash accounts and over, stock accounts with an annual transaction volume upwards of 6 billion. (Data as of Q3) Job Purpose: Within the GRU department, this position will work as a team lead managing the Reconciliation Specialists Job Background/context: Citi Bank NA India - TTS businesses globally facilitate the movement of funds related to their businesses Citi owns many entities and they do hold accounts with Citi bank and various banks/financial institution in order to the movement of funds related to their businesses The role of Cash Nostro Lead is to ensure  the accounts of Citi Bank NA India with various banks (Nostro) and recon accounts of Citi owned entity with various banks are reconciled as per agreed timelines and ensure the exceptions are reported to business for their investigation Key Responsibilities: Ensure no breaks should reach over days due to lack of follow up and escalation Ensure risks associated with process are identified and addressed to avoid breach or losses Ensure SLA is met% Ensure no impact on variance report due to missing of timely matching of breaks Ensure anything suspicious or out of ordinary is escalated to the manager without any delay Ensure SOP are reviewed and approved on periodic basis and updated with changes Ensure escalation policy is adhered by self and by team on high value breaks Ensure good governance over mails, phone calls and group chat updation. To identify and implement process improvement and encourage team towards the same Ensure to create adequate backups 3+3 model for all process within the team To identify and implement Lean Techniques to avoid Non value add in BAU To develop productivity matrix for the team to analyse team productivity and capacity Adherence to key policies associated with process all times Ensure staff at Gurgaon is adequately trained on critical processes and ready to handle in case of crisis Timely and accurate update of BSER and variance reports Development Value: Training, both on the job training and presented training courses Increased Product knowledge Exposure to clients and other departments within Citi This is a great opportunity for a candidate looking to work in a controls environment The role will provide a high level of exposure to internal clients and enable the candidate to develop their client service skills. This is a necessary requirement for anyone hoping to progress into a more senior role within the Reconciliations department The position will also help the candidate to enhance their knowledge of the clients supported within the GRU and their overall knowledge of the industry Hone the skills to work in a demanding, time sensitive and risky process Day In Life Of (DILO) A typical day for a Cash Nostro lead begins with checking aged open breaks and validate if adequate investigation has been carried out by the processors. The individual is responsible for guiding the team on right investigation and ensuring NIL breaks over days. The risks associated with the process should also be kept in mind at all instances and ensure the team is also adequately equipped with that knowledge. It is imperative that individual should ensure that his/her team is completely aware of the policies associated with process and follows laid down procedures in SOP and escalates right on time in case of any mismatch or clarity. The individual is responsible for allocating the work amongst the staff members and ensure that all activities are performed before EOD. The day involves attending calls with Agent Banks for DA status, colleagues from other teams who interact closely with Nostro Team, management meetings, and also responding to a number of e mails from various teams. Work out training plan for team members to ensure 3+3 back up model is created. Any adhoc data or MIS request from senior management is shared with in the timeline specified. Be responsive at all times and take ownership of the entire process. It is not uncommon to face unexpected situations in the form of ad hoc calls or meetings or escalations and needs to be alert, have an eye for detail, be disciplined, responsive and have a passion to excel to be able to succeed in this role. Qualifications Knowledge/Experience: Must be able to use experience to identify possible issues before they arise and also to be pro-active in resolving such issues Must have the ability to multi-task by taking on extra ad-hoc tasks without letting the day-to-day tasks suffer Ability to liaise with demanding clients Ability to lead the team independently Experience in a control, process or reconciliation environment preferential Skills and Competencies: Team Lead Planning and Organizing Analytical/Reasoning Communication/Interpersonal Skills Managing Client Relations Self-Motivated and motivates the team/Results Orientated Displays confidence in dealing with customers and colleagues Maintains a control focus at all times Must have strong analytical skills and PC skills Must have good communication skills Must have good time management skills Ability to quickly adapt to changing dynamic environments Should be flexible with work shifts and be ready to work in different shifts with short notice

Primary Location: India,Tamil Nadu,Chennai Education: Bachelors Degree Job Function: Operations Schedule: Full-time Shift: Day Job Employee Status: Regular Travel Time: Yes, % of the Time Job ID: Description Description: You: An analytical and entrepreneurial professional with a penchant for process re-engineering and a track record of applying Lean methodologies to enact profound change Us: A multinational bank with global resources and an unwavering commitment to serve as a trusted partner to our clients by responsibly providing financial services that enable growth and economic progress Citi is currently recruiting for an Assistant Vice President-level professional with well- rounded knowledge and experience in Lean or Lean Six Sigma methodologies to execute our customized Lean program, CitiLean, within our Chennai Citi Service Center (CSC). Your role will be to partner with local and global process owners and re-engineering teams, helping them redesign their processes to put the customer at the center of everything we do. Through the application of Lean tools and techniques, you will identify major pain points, investigate their root causes and provide innovative solutions that transform the client experience. You will become a trusted advisor to the CSC, enabling, motivating and mobilizing CSC employees to build their skills in operational excellence techniques through both existing and on site trainings and coaching delivery Key Responsibilities: Support individual CitiLean projects across the site where you are located, including: Supporting project leads in scoping and planning the projects (deliverables, timelines, resourcing, etc.) Identifying waste and pain-points in the process using CitiLean tools (including basic Process Mapping, VSM, SIPOC’s, Time and Motion studies, Benchmarking, etc.) and supporting the development of presentations to Senior Leadership Organizing and supporting Kaizen workshops, guiding the project teams on doing Root Cause Analysis and identifying Action Plans for the elimination of Root Causes to solve various Business and Process issues and achieve project/ program objectives Supporting the development of “To–Be” processes, including optimized customer journeys, documenting identified policy and procedure gaps and a plan to implement the future state Supporting and co-facilitating CitiLean training courses Support the implementation of tools and a program of reviews to support a culture of standardized process governance and ‘Operations Excellence’ practices across the CSC in line with the global CitiLean approach Support the development of program reporting and senior stakeholder presentations Other Responsibilities: Support the development and articulation of program progress, successes and challenges through various presentations, training and forums Key Cultural Fit: You are entrepreneurial, and thrive in environments with a blank canvas that will allow you to flex your intellectual muscle to contribute to building a strategy from the ground up You have a passion for Operations Excellence and teach others to standardize and streamline their processes You have a passion for new tech, and are always on the lookout for “what’s new” You are naturally gifted at thinking of ways to “do things better, faster, smarter” You work well in high-pressure situations and consistently deliver under tight time constraints while delighting your stakeholders  You can work across boundaries to fill the gaps, and drive accountability for yourself and others Qualifications Qualifications: Minimum of 3-5+ years total post-graduate work experience with time spent applying Lean or Lean Six Sigma methodologies Excel and PowerPoint skills – this position requires the ability to thoughtfully build and present reports, so strong communication skills and a capacity to structure logical analysis in presentations are key requirements Strong data analytics capabilities, especially cost analysis and internal/external benchmarking Understanding the drivers of value, including the ability to size and prioritize large scale initiatives across businesses and functions Excellent time management skills are required, including the ability to manage and prioritize multiple items at once Highly motivated, organized and methodical Logical, analytical and rational thinker Demonstrated team player Educational Level: Bachelors degree required, Master’s preferred Required Travel: Yes (<%)

page.job_description: A Human Resources Manager is responsible for assisting the Director in the overall management and administration of the Human Resources function in the hotels continuing effort to deliver outstanding guest service and to maximize profitability. What will I be doing? As a Human Resources Manager, you would be responsible for assisting the Director in the overall management and administration of the Human Resources function to deliver an excellent guest experience and financial profitability. Specifically, you would be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards: Manages daily Human Resources operation to include, but not limited to, interviewing and hiring, employment and recruiting, training and development, wage/benefit compensation, team member and labor relations, contract compliance, disciplinary procedures, workers compensation, safety, statutory compliance, recognition and reward and performance evaluations Manage team member relations programs, activities and initiatives to include, but not limited to, picnics, holiday functions, health fairs, award banquets and special events Oversee function of the data management system to include, but not limited to, entry of team member data, recording employment transitions (i.e. hire, separation, leaves of absence, etc.), generating reports (i.e. payroll analysis, labor turnover, etc.) and processing unemployment claims Ensure compliance with Affirmative Action Plan and Equal Employment Opportunity guidelines and regulations

Global Village is looking to hire a Senior Sales Manager to join the commercial department.   Job purpose:  Assist Commercial Director in implementing specific and detailed sponsorship and partnership plans and initiatives for various deals, packages and barters in line with the overall business goals and create new revenue streams. Key Accountabilities  • Develop the Sponsorship, Activation, Customized Product sales strategy for Global Village with the Company Vision, Mission and established service levels • Identify and develop a guest database and establish a well-researched list of prospective guests for sponsorship and Activation to negotiate with them for proposals and create agreements for them so as to ensure effective execution of agreements. • Draft and recommend appropriate relevant policies, processes, systems, standards, and procedures and implement them after approval so that the Company functions efficiently in line with its growth strategies and plans. • Prepare the relevant budgets and targets in order to ensure that all Global Village objectives achieved within agreed parameters and Service levels. • Liaise directly with the various Global Village departments to explore ways of introducing new relevant business streams channels. • Implement new tools and techniques to improve the quality and efficiency of delivering Company services through improved functional and/or operational processes. • Identify effective brand associations and leverage the participation through channels aimed at maximizing PR mileage. • Prepare and present progress reports on a regular basis to the commercial Director, to ensure all relevant parties informed of all partnership arrangements, which will support the efficient delivery of the event objectives. • Identify and develop leads to source partnership from local, regional and international businesses and organizations. • Efficient Planning and Executing market-site visits within assigned region, maintain & review • Monitor market Intelligence within the industry/competition in terms of market development, new products, competitive activity, new customers etc. • Help department director to develop new strategies for revenue growth, including product expansion, market expansion, partnerships. • Sell relevant deals, contribute to the preparation of contracts with partners, study proposals and negotiate with potentials leads to conclude deals. • Develop and structure relevant packages based on an exhaustive research of the local markets and trends and other potential similar projects. • Remain updated with trends and developments in within the industry, particularly relating to event sponsorships, funding and in-kind supporting, activations and loyalty programs, product and service discounts or barter arrangements. • Liaise with Global Village departments to ensure the inclusion of partner requirements at the events site and other negotiated locations, during the events, including appropriate site allocations, signage and other levels of recognition, support and exposure. • Introduce an activation calendar to ensure that all relevant product launches and reveals takes place in Global Village to assure being the pioneer platform in new exposures. • Work closely with Global Village Departments to enter barter deals and sponsorships that will reduce the company expenditures. • To comply with Global Village Vision & Mission. • To integrate work ethic to reflect Global Village Values ( Safety, Integrity, Innovation, Guest Orientation, Commitment, Excellence) • Ensure compliance with all applicable Health, Safety and Environmental (HSE) requirements. Knowledge, Skills, Experience and Competencies   Core Competencies • Customer Focus • Innovation • Leading & Managing Change Functional Competencies • Developing Others • Results Management • Accountability • Teamwork • Resource Management

وظيفة مراقب موقع هي وظيفة تابعة لمدير المرافق والصيانة مباشرة , تعنى بتقديم كافة الدعم اللوجستي لمرافق الاكاديمية والتأكد من ان كافة الخدمات المتعاقد عليها من قبل الشركات الخارجية تقدم حسب الانظمة والتعليمات الداخلية والاشراف المباشر على اداء هذة الشركات وموظفيها والتأكد من كافة العمليات الادارية والفنية مطبقة حسب الخطط الموضوعة من قبل ادارة المرافق والصيانة. هذة وظيفة بدوام كامل من يوم الاحد الى يوم الخميس من الساعة 9:00 صباحا ولغاية الساعة 5:00 مساءا ، علما بأن هذة الوظيفة تتطلب العمل بعد اوقات الدوام الرسمي واثناء العطل الرسمية وحسب الحاجة لذلك . مسؤوليات وظيفة مراقب موقع : 1. الاشراف على اداء شركة النظافة وموظفيها والاشراف على نظافة مواقع الاكاديمية حسب الخطط الموضوعة. 2. الاشراف على اداء شركة الامن والحراسة وموظفيها والتأكد من حماية كافة مرافق الاكاديمية. 3. وضع خطة امن وحراسة مباني الاكاديمية وتنفيذها بالتنسيق مع مدير المرافق. 4. الاشراف على اداء شركة الزراعة ومتابعة اعمال الزراعة والمسطحات الخضراء لكافة مرافق الاكاديمية الداخلية والخارجية. 5. الاشراف على سلامة وصيانة مباني ومرافق الاكاديمية بالتنسيق مع كافة المهندسين المعنيين. 6. اجراء عمليات التفتيش والمتابعة لكافة مرافق الاكاديمية ورفع التقارير اللازمة لمدير المرافق. 7. الاشراف على اداء مشغل الكافتيريا وموظفيه والتأكد من اجراءات السلامة والصحة . 8. الاشراف على مشغل الحضانة وموظفية والتأكد من تطبيق كافة التعليمات حسب العقد الموقع معه. 9. الاشراف على تنظيم مواقف السيارات الداخلية ووضع الخطط اللازمة لذلك بالتنسيق مع مدير المرافق. 10. الاشراف على تنظيم حركة المرور حول كافة الشوارع المحيطة بالاكاديمية وتنظيم اصطفاف السيارات في المواقف الخارجية. 11. الاشراف على تنظيم حركة سير طلاب المدارس القريبة من الاكاديمية وتنظيم حركة سيارات اهالي الطلاب بما يضمن السلامة المرورية الامنة للجميع. 12. الاشراف على عمل موظفي البوفية ( المراسلين ) وضبط ادائهم ومتابعة كافة امورهم الادارية والفنية. 13. رفع التقارير اليومية والشهرية بأنتظام حول سير العمل في مرافق الاكاديمية لمدير المرافق. 14. تدقيق المطالبات المالية الشهرية للشركات المزودة للخدمات 15. اي واجبات اخرى يتم تكليفة بها من قبل مدير المرافق.

Role Summary: The Engineer provides direction and assistance to work group in order to meet assigned objectives. Essential Responsibilities: Execute, with guidance from senior engineering resources, the analysis, design, test, or integration required to define and support assigned components, assemblies or systems that meet business standards and program / product requirements Prepare and present technical data to internal and external customers Document and communicate results of technical data generated Participate on teams assigned to address specific organizational initiatives Share engineering information and promote open dialogue Prepare invention disclosures to protect the technology that provides a competitive advantage to the business Assure proper documentation of technical data generated for the assigned projects and/or tasks consistent with engineering policies and procedures Qualifications/Requirements: Bachelors Degree in Engineering, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, or Computer Science from an accredited college or university (OR a High School Diploma / GED with a minimum 5 years of experience in an engineering, IT, scientific or other technical position) Desired Characteristics: Strong oral and written communication skills. Strong interpersonal and leadership skills. Ability to work independently. Strong problem solving skills. About Us: LM Wind Power, a GE Renewable Energy business (approx. employees globally), is the worlds leading supplier of blades to the wind industry, and the only supplier that operates on a global basis. The wind turbine industry is becoming increasingly complex, with radical progress made over the last few decades, providing great opportunities for professional development and a work environment that promotes initiative and creativity. If working in a company which creates state-of-the-art technology and processes attracts you, LM Wind Power has a career for you. Visit for more information and follow @lmwindpower on social media. GE Renewable Energy is a $ billion start-up that brings together one of the broadest product and service portfolios of the renewable energy industry. Combining onshore and offshore wind, hydro and innovative technologies such as concentrated solar power and more recently turbine blades, GE Renewable Energy has installed more than+ gigawatts capacity globally to make the world work better and cleaner. With more than, employees present in more than countries, GE Renewable Energy is backed by the resources of the worlds first digital industrial company. Our goal is to demonstrate to the rest of the world that nobody should ever have to choose between affordable, reliable, and sustainable energy. Visit for more information and follow @GErenewables on social media. Locations: India; Bengaluru

Job Description About IBM: IBM is a global technology and innovation company. It is the largest technology and consulting employer in the world, with presence in countries. The diversity and breadth of the entire IBM portfolio of research, consulting, solutions, services, systems and software, uniquely distinguishes IBM from other companies in the industry. Over the past years, a lot has changed at IBM, in this new era of Cognitive Business, IBM is helping to reshape industries as diverse as healthcare, retail, banking, travel, manufacturing, and many more, by bringing together our expertise in Cloud, Analytics, Security, Mobile, and the Internet of Things. We like to say, “Be essential.” We are changing how we create. How we collaborate. How we analyze. How we engage. IBM is a leader in this global transformation. Join the next generation of innovators, inventors and entrepreneurs who are changing the very way the world works. We want the brightest minds doing work that inspires, in an environment where growth is encouraged. IBM’ers get to discover their potential, so they’re inspired to create breakthroughs that help our clients succeed. We’re building diverse teams with people who want their ideas to matter. Join us — you’ll be proud to call yourself an IBM’er. Business Unit Introduction: IBM Watson Health represents a new partnership between humanity and technology. The era of cognitive healthcare is here. It’s time to transform health with new ways of working to improve approaches to care, productivity and well-being. IBM Watson Health’s cognitive systems understand, reason and learn – helping to translate information into knowledge that can help drive more informed decision-making. With cognitive computing, we can see and analyze more data than ever before – and achieve more than we ever thought possible. IBM Watson Health offers complete end-to-end value based solutions to optimize performance, engage consumers, deliver effective care and manage entire patient populations. It provides robust data integration and aggregation competency, risk-stratified analytics, performance measurement reporting, care management and care coordination tools, and patient engagement solutions that help enable every member of the care team to function at the highest level. Our exclusive innovation in cognitive computing enhances and accelerates expertise while facilitating collaboration and containing cost. This translates to a streamlined approach to managing population health for you and your health system. Who you are: As a Network Engineer you will support day to day out Operations and implement projects and also this position focuses on managing and maintaining network devices and applications. You will be part of a driven team responsible for the delivery of Watson solutions into a wide range of Clients and Business Sectors. You will be part of a team engaged in our Watson Delivery Cloud and our global data center expansion. This role requires demonstrated knowledge in Cloud Technology, Routing, Switching, Internet Protocol, Network Security, and Network Virtualization technologies What youll do: Designing and implementing new and complex high quality solutions for Watson products and clients in response to varying business requirements, implementing strategic Cloud networks utilizing demonstrated knowledge of leading-edge products and technology in conjunction with industry and business skills to influence functional and non-functional strategy. Work with major network providers and vendors to implement and support the Watson Network. Implement tools, processes, priorities and resources necessary to manage, analyze, design and implement business directives for our network. Engineering, and implementing a global network strategy for Watson and integration with Softlayer. Implement Network solutions which adhere to all applicable security and compliance standards. Network management and support. Data center facilities planning, such as cabling, spacing, and electrical planning. Support - Checkpoint Firewall infrastructure. F5 Load Balancer infrastructure and Cisco LAN environments. Work with various teams from all Watson Healthcare divisions to support custom network solutions. Willingness to adapt and learn new technologies. How we’ll help you grow: You have opportunity to work in many different areas to figure out what really excites you. You’ll have access to all the technical and management training courses you need to become the expert you want to be. Required Technical and Professional Expertise 5+ years of related technical experience in Data Center environments. Skilled in Cisco IOS and NXOS, Switching and Routing. Skilled in F5 Administration and Management along with SSL Certificate. Skilled in Checkpoint Administration and Management. Experience in WAN including vendor communication. Experience working in a Cisco environment including both LAN and WAN technologies. Preferred Tech and Prof Experience Proven ability to troubleshoot complex issues related to network hardware, L3/L2 deployment, application behaviors and TCP stack. Understanding of Network Infrastructure and topology, LAN/WAN, TCP/IP, IPv4, VPN and Network Monitoring tools. Experience with network diagnostic, monitoring and analysis tools. Experience in any one of below Networking Tools like Splunk, Sevone Cisco ACS, Cisco Prime and Gigamon Packet Capture. EO Statement IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

Technical Lead - Mechanical  -  DOH2  Primary Location - Qatar-Doha  With more than people around the globe, GHD is one of the world’s leading professional services companies operating in the global markets of water, energy and resources, environment, property and buildings, and transportation. Serving clients across five continents and the Pacific region, GHD people share a passion for exceeding the expectations of our clients and contributing to their success.   Our Middle East operations have an exciting opportunity for an experienced Principal Mechanical Engineer to join our Qatar Operating Centre. Ideally Chartered and / or holding a certification in Project Management, with a minimum years’ experience and a sound understanding of current mechanical engineering technologies in design, management and delivery of large institutional residential, commercial, educational, hotel and/ or hospital developments.    The successful candidate will possess the following;    A proven track record of delivering large-scale multidisciplinary sustainable building designs, on time and within budget in a commercial environment Ability to successfully manage clients and other significant internal and external stakeholders Extensive experience in mechanical services, including HVAC, plumbing, hydraulic and firefighting investigations and designs, fee proposals, winning jobs and negotiating contracts with clients Knowledge of British, NFPA and CIBSE standards and requirements Strong technical report writing and documentation skills Extensive experience in using current technology analysis software for heat load calculations and energy modeling Experience with Building Information Management (Revit) is desirable Middle East experience and a working knowledge of design and construction practices specific to this region will be considered favorably Leadership, time management and communications skills (English written and oral) is an essential In possession of or progressing towards MMUP registration.   In addition to your technical strengths, we are looking for strong mentoring skills that can lead a team and deliver solutions to clients that are innovative, sustainable and appropriate.  Demonstrate support and compliance with the requirements of the GHD QA / Health, Safety and Management System through understanding and commitment to GHDs values, Code of Conduct and Policies while enjoying working closely with like-minded professionals in a consultative environment.   This is a great opportunity for you to develop your career while being part of a well-established and growing organisation. A competitive salary package will be offered to the successful candidate based on qualifications, skills and experience. GHD practices family friendly policies and warmly welcomes applications from all nationalities and supports the nationalisation programs in Qatar and the United Arab Emirates.   Please forward your covering letter and resume.   Job Posting : Nov 7,

GE Renewable Energy is a $ billion start-up that brings together one of the broadest product and service portfolios of the renewable energy industry. Combining onshore and offshore wind, hydro and innovative technologies such as concentrated solar power and more recently turbine blades, GE Renewable Energy has installed more than+ gigawatts capacity globally to make the world work better and cleaner. With more than, employees present in more than countries, GE Renewable Energy is backed by the resources of the worlds first digital industrial company. Our goal is to demonstrate to the rest of the world that nobody should ever have to choose between affordable, reliable, and sustainable energy. page.job_title: Assistant Store Manager - Mothercare - KSA CP
page.job_description: The Role: You will work with the Store Manager to achieve objectives, ensuring the highest levels of customer service are provided by staff and that they have the skills and support required to maximise sales. You will work with a variety of different departments to maintain the effective operation of the store and will provide feedback to the store, brand and area managers around staff and products. You may also be required to deputise for the Store Manager during periods of leave. You must have previous management or supervisory experience in retail and a passion for customer service. Qualifications & Requirements: You will have: * At least 3 years' retail experience (ideally at a supervisory level) * An understanding of fashion retail * Excellent English language skills, both written and verbal (Arabic language skills are also an advantage) * PC literacy. About Alshaya: As a leading international franchise operator, with nearly 90 of the world's most recognised brands in its portfolio, Alshaya Group brings great shopping, dining, leisure and hospitality experiences to millions of customers across the Middle East & North Africa, Russia, Turkey, Europe and beyond. Alshaya Group is a dynamic multinational business and family owned enterprise with a consistent record of growth and innovation. For 35 years, Alshaya has been a pioneering force in brand franchising, using its exceptional knowledge and experience to expand at pace. Our portfolio of well-loved international brands includes Starbucks, H&M, Mothercare, Debenhams, American Eagle Outfitters, P.F. Chang's, The Cheesecake Factory, The Body Shop, M.A.C, Victoria's Secret, Boots, Pottery Barn, KidZania and, coming soon, Hampton by Hilton. From one retail franchise store opened in Kuwait in 1983, Alshaya Group has consistently grown and diversified and today offers customers an unparalleled choice of brands across multiple sectors; Fashion & Footwear, Health & Beauty, Food, Optics, Pharmacy, Home Furnishings, Leisure & Entertainment, and Hotels. A diverse, skilled team of 53,000 people from 120 nationalities support more than 4,000 stores, cafes, restaurants and leisure destinations, a growing online business and a commitment to delivering great customer experiences.

Role Summary: Development of new and modernization of existing diesel-electric locomotives. Essential Responsibilities: Plays lead systems integrator role in development, production and commissioning of new locomotives and locomotive modernizations in the region and worldwide. Technical coordination and leadership of new locomotive and locomotive modernization requisitions. Prepare, hold, follow-up and participate in technical design reviews to ensure customer CTQs are thoroughly evaluated and flown down appropriately through System Functional Specification (SFS) and in compliance to GE processes and GE Design Guides. Work in multi-functional engineering environment (system engineers, electrical and mechanical sub-systems design, manufacturing), establishing effective communication links. Interface in effective way with projects core team (Program/Product management, Principal engineering) and other involved functions (i.e. Quality, Sourcing, Sales and Service teams). Work effectively as part of professional and enthusiastic team. Actively support NPI, NCI, Productivity and Reliability projects. Prepare technical documentation during the engineering phase of NPI, NCI processes. Coordinate First Article Inspections (FAI) as well as support manufacturing team with production issues troubleshooting. Provide engineering support during product launch and commissioning at customer site. Ensure the product passed validation tests and meets all defined requirements. Participate in technical concept development during proposal process. Work with global engineering teams to develop design solutions to meet certification requirements. Produce design documentation for certification as required. Lead control electronics obsolescence projects as Systems integrator. Qualifications/Requirements: Masters degree in Electrical/ Mechanical Engineering discipline. Minimum 3 years of proven engineering experience in development/troubleshooting of complex electrical/mechanical systems Fluent in English Intermediate or above. Ability to travel in-country and worldwide. Desired Characteristics: Strong oral and written communication skills. Systems approach and analytical mindset. Project planning and organizational skills. Teamwork, integrity, accountability and execution speed. PC advanced user. Skilled in MS Office applications. Ability to work without assistance. Experience to cooperate with customer/partner employees. Previous experience in rolling stock industry. Preferably in engineering design/development. Experience in foreign company. About Us: GE is the worlds Digital Industrial Company, transforming industry with software-defined machines and solutions that are connected, responsive and predictive. Through our people, leadership development, services, technology and scale, GE delivers better outcomes for global customers by speaking the language of industry. At GE Transportation, we move the world. We are a global digital industrial leader and supplier to the rail, mining, marine, stationary power and drilling industries. Our solutions help customers deliver goods and services with greater speed and greater savings using our advanced manufacturing techniques, industry expertise and connected machines. Established more than a century ago, GE Transportation is a division of GE that began as a pioneer in passenger and freight locomotives. That innovative spirit still drives GE Transportation today. Its the engine of change that puts us at the forefront of transportation technology, software, and analytics. And its why we continue to find-and realize-the potential that keeps our connected world moving forward. The GE Transportation Global Headquarters is located in Chicago, Illinois. There are over service sites worldwide. Locations: India, Russian Federation; Moscow; Bengaluru

Define Medtronic customer connect framework Customer engagement as per Medtronic customer connect framework Identifying the right stake holders (commercial, labs, management) within the customer organization and establish mutually favorable relationship Drive quarterly reviews for customer delight score, processes and improvement initiatives Own Medtronic service performance (including right inventory levels) Enabling right communication, PR and training of customer org Manage contact center operations and proactively solving customer issues   B)      Service operations ·         Customer and Channel Delight: ·         Business connect and satisfaction with channel performance ·         Quality, compliance and efficiency of channel ·         Channel selection, onboarding, training and exit process ·         Channel performance, dashboard, quarterly reviews ·         Solving channel issues and proactive handling for complaints ·         Channel commercial success – timely payments, claim settlements, no dues   D)     Team and Stakeholder management: Lead and guide the team of account managers and service operations Key Stake holder (business, supply chain, finance and more) management at Medtronic   Metrics Ownership: ·         Customer delight (NPS) ·         Business and channel delight (satisfaction score) ·         Channel efficiency – SLAs and cost ·         Working capital and Inventory cost ·         Compliance Score ·         Account receivable %, Over due % Must Have – Minimum Requirements     QUALIFICATIONS/EXPERIENCE   Education   •          Graduate with MBA in Finance or Marketing or Strategy   Relevant prior Experience and Knowledge which will be useful in current role •           – years of experience in enterprise / corporate sales and account management •          Preferably from Telecom (Airtel / Voda) or IT Solutions (IBM / HP/ Dell ) or Corporate Banking (Citi / Amex/ ICICI/ Amex) or BPMs (Accenture / TCS / Infosys/ CTS) with experience of managing strategic accounts PERFORMANCE SKILLS Skills required for successful performance in this Role Communication skills and Interpersonal skills   •          Effective and persuasive communication Accounting /Technical Knowledge •          Research and modelling for customer satisfaction and delight Business partnership •          Collaboration skills •          Effective stake holder management skills •          Lead cross functional initiatives TRAITS Competencies that will help to successfully accomplish the job Customer Centricity •          Think customer first Problem Solving •          Good at problem definition, root cause analysis and data Result orientation •          Result and impact orientation     Nice to Have   ·         Excellent communication and interpersonal skills: Good verbal communicator and presenter ·         Professional presentation and "Presence" ·         Can work autonomously but is also a team player ·         Self motivated and positive ·         Outgoing and friendly:  Enthusiastic, energetic ·         “Can do” attitude ·         Ability to quickly establish credibility with all levels of customer base ·         Good time manager:  Well organized, able to set and reset priorities ·         Willingness to learn, especially technical information ·         Diplomatic PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS: The physical demands described within the Responsibilities section of this job description are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job.  Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to be independently mobile. The employee is also required to interact with a computer, and communicate with peers and co-workers.     ABOUT MEDTRONIC   Together, we can change healthcare worldwide.  At Medtronic, we push the limits of what technology can do to help alleviate pain, restore health and extend life.  We challenge ourselves and each other to make tomorrow better than yesterday.  It is what makes this an exciting and rewarding place to be. We can accelerate and advance our ability to create meaningful innovations – but we will only succeed with the right people on our team.  Let’s work together to address universal healthcare needs and improve patients’ lives.  Help us shape the future.

The Safety & Health position is a senior position reporting to the Facilities & Maintenance Manager; the Health and Safety Supervisor will be responsible for providing support to the employees, supervisors, foremen and workers. This position will provide leadership and coordination of the day-to-day safety requirements of the assigned buildings S/he is required to organize and manage all the Safety operations in the buildings In this position, Safety & Health supervisor shall play a key role in the proper care and Safety of the buildings. This is a full-time position. Standard days and hours of work are Sunday through Thursday 9:00 a.m. to 5 p.m. However, this position might involve staying afterhours when necessary. Safety & Health Supervisor Job Responsibilities: 1. Develop a Site Safety Management Plan (SMP) for the academy site to ensure a safe work environment for all company employees, students, contractors, visitors and community. 2. Develop Health and safety policy. 3. Develop Evacuation Plan. 4. Develop Emergency plan. 5. Develop Assembly points locations & signs. 6. Act as a Fire Evacuation officer. 7. Organize and schedule required safety staff and first aid coverage. 8. Ensure that all incidents are reported immediately. 9. Ensure incident corrective actions are followed up on and completed. 10. Communicate, coach and assist the Academy staff to ensure that all safety expectations are understood and met. 11. Provision of advice and dissemination of information to staff and students on workplace health, safety and welfare issues, including policies and procedures. 12. Carry out inspections of all areas (at least annually, recommended 6 monthly), including in defined common areas in multi-occupancy building, 13. Facilitation of staff/student attendance at appropriate mandatory H&S Services training courses. 14. Follow-up maintenance of fire extinguishers. 15. co-ordinate fire alarm testing. 16. Perform any required job of his/her direct manager

وظيفة فني اعمال مدنية هي وظيفة تابعة لمدير المرافق والصيانة مباشرة , تعنى بالاشراف على كافة الاعمال المدنية والمعمارية الداخلية والخارجية وادامه عمل كافة مرافق الاكاديمية. هذة وظيفة بدوام كامل من يوم الاحد الى يوم الخميس من الساعة 9:00 صباحا ولغاية الساعة 5:00 مساءا ، علما بأن هذة الوظيفة تتطلب العمل بعد اوقات الدوام الرسمي واثناء العطل الرسمية وحسب الحاجة لذلك . مسؤوليات وظيفة فني اعمال مدنية : 1. صيانة الابواب والشبابيك بكافة انواعها واكسسواراتها. 2. صيانة الارضيات والبلاط والسيراميك لكافة مرافق الاكاديمية الداخلية والخارجية. 3. صيانة ودهات الجدران والاسقف والممرات . 4. تعليق الصور والبراويز حسب التعليمات الناظمة لذلك. 5. اعمال النجارة وتصليح الاثاث . 6. اعمال الحدادة واللحام . 7. تنفيذ برنامج الصيانة الوقائية . 8. تحديد وطلب قطع الغيار والعدد والالات اللازمة لتنفيذ العمل. 9. تطبيق اجراءات السلامة والصحة المهنية بما يتعلق بتفاصيل العمل. 10. اي اعمال اخرى يتم تكليفة بها من قبل مدير المرافق

Job Description You and IBM India IBMs Purpose is to be essential to our clients, to the world and one another and we are confident that together as IBMers we will drive this purpose. When you join IBM you join a culture of openness, teamwork, trust, and the invitation and expectation to have a voice. Join us and Do your Best Work Ever. We are recognized gold standard for inclusion, reflected in winning, to name a few, the Catalyst Award for advancing women in business, the National Award Best Employer of People with Disabilities and being named one of the top 5 Top Companies for Women Technologists for building an inclusive workplace — We advocate for fairness and equality as everyone is, and always has been, welcome at IBM. We at IBM Global Business Services (GBS) are a dynamic group of Business, Strategy and Technology professionals - a specific source of best-in-class Industry Consulting, Application and Business process management, supported by the industrys most sophisticated outcome-based delivery model. All designed to be the Digital Reinvention partner for leading clients across the world - providing value-led and asset-powered end to end solutions. With a global footprint in over countries, we are empowering clients to build upon their tremendous heritage in Application Innovation processes and also transform them to a Cloud, Cognitive and Social centric world. With skills across six sectors and industries, all major service lines and competencies, IBM’s GBS is a promising business unit in itself to be a part of. Through our unique global delivery network; IBM offers global expertise coupled with a deep understanding of local capabilities, markets and cultures you could be part of and partner on some great projects with some of the best corporations in the world across geographies. Research and develop skills in new development tools You will come with... Hands on experience working on AFS, 3GL, 4GL, DAL, DAL2, DLL etc. Excellent problem solving skills . How we’ll help you grow... You’ll have access to all the technical and management training courses to grow your expertise. You’ll learn directly from expert developers in the field; our team leads love to mentor. You have the opportunity to work in many different areas to determine what really excites you. Required Technical and Professional Expertise 2-5 Years of experience on ERP BAAN. Infor LN Administration and Job handling Business Object development ( Custom),BDE development experience . ION related Project experience Database procedures Preferred Tech and Prof Experience Excellent verbal and written communication skill. Knowledge of EDI, Functional Modules like Logistics, Finance etc is an advantage EO Statement IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

About Alshaya: As a leading international franchise operator, with nearly 90 of the world's most recognised brands in its portfolio, Alshaya Group brings great shopping, dining, leisure and hospitality experiences to millions of customers across the Middle East & North Africa, Russia, Turkey, Europe and beyond. Alshaya Group is a dynamic multinational business and family owned enterprise with a consistent record of growth and innovation. For 35 years, Alshaya has been a pioneering force in brand franchising, using its exceptional knowledge and experience to expand at pace. Our portfolio of well-loved international brands includes Starbucks, H&M, Mothercare, Debenhams, American Eagle Outfitters, P.F. Chang's, The Cheesecake Factory, The Body Shop, M.A.C, Victoria's Secret, Boots, Pottery Barn, KidZania and, coming soon, Hampton by Hilton. From one retail franchise store opened in Kuwait in 1983, Alshaya Group has consistently grown and diversified and today offers customers an unparalleled choice of brands across multiple sectors; Fashion & Footwear, Health & Beauty, Food, Optics, Pharmacy, Home Furnishings, Leisure & Entertainment, and Hotels. A diverse, skilled team of 53,000 people from 120 nationalities support more than 4,000 stores, cafes, restaurants and leisure destinations, a growing online business and a commitment to delivering great customer experiences.

page.job_title: Associate or Full Professor in Financial Accounting
page.job_description: The College of Business and Economics at the United Arab Emirates University is searching for Professor in Financial Accounting to start in the January. The search is open at the Associate or Full Professor level. Appointment at a particular level will be based on an applicant’s scholarly and teaching record. The candidate is expected to actively engage in promoting the growth of the Accounting program and the College of Business and Economics (CBE) at UAE University. The Accounting Department, within which the position is located in CBE, is reputable for excellence in accounting education and research in the UAE and within the GCC and the MENA region. It aspires to be one of the leading global centers for accounting thought. The department is the only AACSB-Accounting Accredited department in GCC and MENA region. Our undergraduate and postgraduate programs provide the practical and theoretical knowledge necessary for navigating and providing leadership for the complex global world of business; and helps students develop the skills needed for life-long learning and for effective participation in organizations and society. Our faculty experts research a broad range of topics that provide insights into new ways of thinking and learning for accounting and society. Key Duties and Responsibilities The appointed candidate will be expected to: • Develop and teach undergraduate and postgraduate courses in accounting (with emphasis on financial accounting); • Engage in innovative and technology-based approaches to learning and teaching; • Publish high quality research in leading internationally recognized accounting journals; • Participate in the supervision of undergraduate and postgraduate research projects and/or dissertations; • Participate in committee at the departmental, college and/or university levels as assigned; • Actively engage in promoting the growth of the UAE University; and • Perform administrative duties as assigned by the Department Chair and the College Dean. Selection Criteria • A PhD in Accounting from an internationally recognized university (with emphasis on financial accounting); • Strong commitment to excellence in teaching, curriculum development, and outcome assessment; • Experience in teaching financial accounting at both the undergraduate and postgraduate levels; • Demonstrated ability to publish in leading international accounting journals; • Ability to communicate effectively in English; and • Very good interpersonal skills. In addition to the above, professional qualification and experience in practice setting will be highly valued. Please submit your application online at The application package should include a cover letter indicating how you meet the selection criteria, a detailed resume, teaching philosophy, courses taught, professional designations/expertise in accounting, and a brief description of current/future research activities. English is the language of instructions and communication in the CBE. The review of applications will begin on November 4, and will continue until the position is filled. To ensure that your application is considered, please, apply before the application review date is advised. All enquiries about this job may be directed to the Chair of the Accounting Department, Professor Habib Mahama ().

Role Summary: You will play the role of trusted partner in a digital transformation of our clients, while working with all BHGE lines of business and propose value added solutions that will help our clients expand their business and prepare for future challenges. You will maintain curiosity to understand our customers business and drive the customer relationship to new directions to discover new areas where both the customer and BHGE can win. Essential Responsibilities: In this role you will help manage named client accounts with an emphasis on value and outcome selling from Digital Transformation. Lead digital transformation opportunities together with the local sales team in addressing complex and out of standard engagements by: Providing sales strategy insights, challenging the sales approach, shifting mindsets to value delivery to customer rather than product push Formulating a clear and meaningful customers business problem statement to resolve Defining a disruptive value proposition transforming the way how our customers do business enabled by BHGE and GE technology and ecosystem Providing methodology and driving force ensuring the sales process is executed with highest quality standards and commitment with target dates Leveraging skills and expertise within BHGE group to support the sales effort and coordinating them Supporting the local sales team in facing customer and in preparation of deliverables required during sales process Report and present conclusion and outcomes to the C-level and Executive team Create and deliver solution outlines across BHGE and GE solutions and migration paths that show the evolution of a system from a baseline state to a target or future digital roadmap and state. Coordinate a cross-functional, cross-LOB and potentially partner driven team approach in a complex sales cycle. Map out customers decision-making process and identify areas where digital is rapidly shifting the sales paradigm. Use available client data to proactively identify possible needs before they are expressed by client. Help Manage multiple decision makers to move deal to closure. Evaluate and prioritize the need for additional resources to advance the sale, focusing on competitive advantage and cost efficiencies. Work with the Account Managers and peers to identify and streamline the correct Commercial Operations processes. Utilize industry knowledge and skillsets to support an industry relevant line of questioning and resultant problem-solving definition. Identify next steps and how to string together near-term successes that can be the foundation for future engagements and an expanded business. Work with the entire sales and pre-sales team in: oQualifying the opportunity: customer potential to invest in Digital at large scale, context favorable or not for investing in a Digital transformation oBuilding the sales strategy: power map, competition map, BHGE SWOT, key success factors. oRunning discovery workshops with customer to understand business challenges and raise interest in Digital oRunning assessment workshops with customer to understand more in-depth business requirements, priorities and constraints oTranslating these business requirements into digital solutions, working closely with Oil and Gas SMEs and the Technical team (Sales solution architects, Data scientists, and Product team) oBuilding a value proposition detailing the most appropriate digital solution for the customer, its business case and implementation roadmap oIf required, building out of standard business models to enable the Digital transformation (JV creation, funding by external parties oSupporting the Sales Commercial Operations team in preparing the Technical and Commercial proposal oDriving technical and commercial discussions and negotiations with customer up to contract signature Qualifications/Requirements: Bachelors Degree in business, engineering, computer science or related discipline Masters degree in Business Management or Engineering. MBA degree is a key differentiator + years experience in Consultancy, Oil and Gas and or Digital industry Proven track records in a reputed consultancy addressing Oil and Gas Operational Excellence projects or Digital Transformation projects. Experience in a top-tier strategy consultancy is a key differentiator. Oil and Gas industry expertise, strong technical background and demonstrated capabilities in Business Development Experience in software industry experience minimum with proven track record Good knowledge of Middle East Oil and Gas market with 5+ years spent in the region. Desired Characteristics: Able to coordinate a cross-functional team approach in a complex sales cycle. Proven experience in closing multimillion dollar plus deals. Demonstrated ability to prospect and develop new accounts into a sustainable revenue stream. Demonstrated ability to quickly build trust and rapport, and develop influential relationships at all levels of an organization. Working knowledge of CRM systems for pipeline and opportunity management. Value and Outcome Sales training experience utilizing sales tools for account management. About Us: GE (NYSE:GE) drives the world forward by tackling its biggest challenges. By combining world-class engineering with software and analytics, GE helps the world work more efficiently, reliably, and safely. GE people are global, diverse and dedicated, operating with the highest integrity and passion to fulfill GEs mission and deliver for our customers. Locations: United Arab Emirates; Jebel Ali
