وظيفة مراقب موقع هي وظيفة تابعة لمدير المرافق والصيانة مباشرة , تعنى بتقديم كافة الدعم اللوجستي لمرافق الاكاديمية والتأكد من ان كافة الخدمات المتعاقد عليها من قبل الشركات الخارجية تقدم حسب الانظمة والتعليمات الداخلية والاشراف المباشر على اداء هذة الشركات وموظفيها والتأكد من كافة العمليات الادارية والفنية مطبقة حسب الخطط الموضوعة من قبل ادارة المرافق والصيانة. هذة وظيفة بدوام كامل من يوم الاحد الى يوم الخميس من الساعة 9:00 صباحا ولغاية الساعة 5:00 مساءا ، علما بأن هذة الوظيفة تتطلب العمل بعد اوقات الدوام الرسمي واثناء العطل الرسمية وحسب الحاجة لذلك . مسؤوليات وظيفة مراقب موقع : 1. الاشراف على اداء شركة النظافة وموظفيها والاشراف على نظافة مواقع الاكاديمية حسب الخطط الموضوعة. 2. الاشراف على اداء شركة الامن والحراسة وموظفيها والتأكد من حماية كافة مرافق الاكاديمية. 3. وضع خطة امن وحراسة مباني الاكاديمية وتنفيذها بالتنسيق مع مدير المرافق. 4. الاشراف على اداء شركة الزراعة ومتابعة اعمال الزراعة والمسطحات الخضراء لكافة مرافق الاكاديمية الداخلية والخارجية. 5. الاشراف على سلامة وصيانة مباني ومرافق الاكاديمية بالتنسيق مع كافة المهندسين المعنيين. 6. اجراء عمليات التفتيش والمتابعة لكافة مرافق الاكاديمية ورفع التقارير اللازمة لمدير المرافق. 7. الاشراف على اداء مشغل الكافتيريا وموظفيه والتأكد من اجراءات السلامة والصحة . 8. الاشراف على مشغل الحضانة وموظفية والتأكد من تطبيق كافة التعليمات حسب العقد الموقع معه. 9. الاشراف على تنظيم مواقف السيارات الداخلية ووضع الخطط اللازمة لذلك بالتنسيق مع مدير المرافق. 10. الاشراف على تنظيم حركة المرور حول كافة الشوارع المحيطة بالاكاديمية وتنظيم اصطفاف السيارات في المواقف الخارجية. 11. الاشراف على تنظيم حركة سير طلاب المدارس القريبة من الاكاديمية وتنظيم حركة سيارات اهالي الطلاب بما يضمن السلامة المرورية الامنة للجميع. 12. الاشراف على عمل موظفي البوفية ( المراسلين ) وضبط ادائهم ومتابعة كافة امورهم الادارية والفنية. 13. رفع التقارير اليومية والشهرية بأنتظام حول سير العمل في مرافق الاكاديمية لمدير المرافق. 14. تدقيق المطالبات المالية الشهرية للشركات المزودة للخدمات 15. اي واجبات اخرى يتم تكليفة بها من قبل مدير المرافق.

Nokia is a global leader in the technologies that connect people and things. With state-of-the-art software, hardware and services for any type of network, Nokia is uniquely positioned to help communication service providers, governments, and large enterprises deliver on the promise of 5G, the Cloud and the Internet of Things.　 Serving customers in over countries, our research scientists and engineers continue to invent and accelerate new technologies that will increasingly transform the way people and things communicate and connect.   Nokia is a key supplier to help operators on their transformation journey to Telco Cloud business. To drive Nokia’s and our Customers success Nokia requires highly effective internal capabilities across Marketing, Sales, Pre-Sales / Tendering and Post-Sales Service customer engagement, digitally and face to face.     The Design and Realization of such Capabilities will be executed in Nokia’s global “Digital Customer Center of Excellence”. The Center of Excellence is seeking innovative and passionate software solution engineers and designers who share our vision of bringing excellence in all of Nokia’s Digital Customer interactions.   Your ability to bring your vision and concepts to life will not only be welcomed but celebrated. You will be creating high quality, interactive prototypes that will be seen and used daily by thousands. You will be working with a highly driven team that has delivered countless successful solutions to customer teams around the world.  This is not your typical software development position. Our team is focused on rapid prototyping and working against short deadlines.   The Digital Customer Center of Excellence drives the exploration of customer relationship management (CRM) software. Shift to cloud computing, provides Nokia (along with other strategic partners) with the next generation of social, mobile and cloud technologies helping Nokia to achieve excellence of Digital Customer experience.   Description: We are seeking innovative and passionate Solution Experts in the following role of Solution Designer, who share our vision of bringing the power of cloud computing to enterprises.   If youre passionate about innovation, come help us to revolutionize how Nokia collaborates and communicates with our customers. The Digital Customer Center of Excellence will be responsible for successfully creating enterprise Digital Customer experiences using solutions and services and integrating with other enterprise systems and Application Exchange partners. These technologies include, but are not necessarily limited to , and APIs, Lightning/Apex, Heroku, mobile development technologies, and ETL technologies. It also requires that the Solution Expert maintains an ongoing comprehensive understanding of the cloud-computing ecosystem. Ideally, the candidate has knowledge of CRM solutions, awareness of and any certification with is advantageous. However, candidates with a solid software engineering and technical architecture and development background in Java, .Net and integration will also be valued.   This position requires someone who has great interpersonal skills to work with many different departments within the company including our executive management team, marketing, sales management, and operations groups. In your role as a Solution Expert, your day-to-day tasks will consist of creating visually engaging, innovative and functional mobile and web-based Digital Customer engagement solutions.   Responsibilities: Work closely with Digital Customer Capability team, Enterprise Architects and Cyber Security teams and directly with Nokia’s Business stakeholders to design and deliver cloud solutions to meet Digital Customer experience needs. Have ownership of the solution from end to end and be responsible for design and documenting a technical solution based on project requirements and industry best practices. Potential to lead and mentor other software engineers across projects as experience grows. Enforce sound development practices and ensure the quality delivery of enterprise solutions. Serve as a trusted advisor to the Digital Customer Capability teams and our Nokia Business stakeholders. Contribute excellence in a highly collaborative, team-oriented environment. Required Skills/Experience: Bachelor’s degree required in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Business. Proven ability to design, optimize and integrate business processes across disparate systems. Experience with ETL tools. Experience developing and deploying custom end user systems. Experience overseeing team members. Have thorough understanding of OOP, design patterns, and enterprise application integration. Excellent analysis skills and the ability to develop processes and methodologies Detail-oriented individual with the ability to rapidly learn and take advantage of new concepts, business models, and technologies. Desired Skills/Experience: Extraordinary client facing skills with the ability to solve the clients needs and manage scope in a positive way. Agile methodology experience Must be driven by user experience always with strong ability to achieve solution needs with the user first in mind at all times. Strong ability to work collaboratively with other Nokia Digital Customer teams to take instruction and drive better solutions, delivering above the expectations of the Business stakeholder. Ability to actively participate, organize and from time to time lead Business stakeholder sessions that result in clear requirements and technical design, even when working with non-technical members of stakeholder teams. Ability to generate stakeholder sign-off and commitment to these designs and the solution.

The team develops and maintains reports and tools, and the team is responsible for leading transformational Control projects and automation efforts across Global Consumer Banking. The individual in this role will report to the Senior Vice President of Report Development for Global CBORC and will specifically focus on ‘build-the-bank’ type efforts that enhance CBORC’s ability to proactively measure and manage Operational Risk. This role requires an individual with a technical acumen, familiar with leading and using agile methods and projects, with a strong desire to work in a fast pace, dynamic function.  Key Responsibility Overview: The person in this role will be responsible for interfacing with stakeholders across multiple functional disciplines to understand reporting requirements, identify data sources, scripting and coding within Qlikview and interfacing with end-users and leadership to meet reporting objectives.  Post build activities include:  Data Mgt, Data Source Uploads, Interface with Technology for SDLC Deployment, and Providing Training and Support to End-Users when needed Additional Responsibilities Include: Directs key initiatives within Consumer Banking through the collection, analysis, review, reporting, documentation and communication of business needs and requirements Coordinates cross multiple business Control functions to ensure strategies and reporting approaches are consistent globally Provides analysis with interpretive thinking to define problems, develop innovative solutions, and make recommendation that influence decisions of key business partners. The person in this role will be responsible for creating and managing project plans that:  Define current state reporting inefficiencies Define future state solutions for efficiency and effectiveness Manage timelines and deliverables independently with limited supervision Providing Senior and Executive Leadership with regular updates Oversee Technology Implementations Perform and/or lead User Assisted Testing (UAT) At times, manage matrix consultants to ensure effective and accurate delivery of technology solutions Develop and Manage Adoption Strategies to ensure ROI with Tool deployment Manages complex processes and reporting streams Performs impact analyses on project activities Influence strategic functional decisions through advice, counsel or provided services that have direct impact on the business Aid in the development of analytical approaches and technologies Manage a team of in business developers / Business Analysts Qualifications Job Skills/Qualifications Financial Institution experience NOT required Experience in building Reports and Dashboards in the Business Intelligence Platform Qlikview Ability to document, communicate and lead the execution of business needs; oversee and manage technology lead efforts Strong Understanding of Agile Project Management Ability to translate ambiguous visions from End-Users into meaningful outputs Understanding in developing a business cases that details Return-on-Investment (ROI) Proactive and Organized Global Project Management Experience Experience in Analytics functions Commitment to quality, attention to detail, and continuous improvement Advanced user in Access, Excel, PowerPoint, and Word Experience in Mobile Application Delivery a plus Experience in Digital Control Testing Software / Scripting a plus Experience in Statistical Software / SAS, R, Hadoop, a plus Education:  Minimum Bachelor’s Degree and/or Commensurate Experience

Job Description You and IBM India IBMs Purpose is to be essential to our clients, to the world and one another and we are confident that together as IBMers we will drive this purpose. Joining IBM is about joining a culture of openness, teamwork, trust, and the invitation and expectation to have a voice. Join us and Do your Best Work Ever. IBM is recognized gold standard for inclusion, reflected in winning, to name few, the Catalyst Award for advancing women in business, the National Award Best Employer of People with Disabilities and being named one of the top 5 Top Companies for Women Technologists for building an inclusive workplace — We advocate for fairness and equality as everyone is, and always has been, welcome at IBM. We at IBM Global Business Services (GBS) are a dynamic group of Business, Strategy and Technology professionals - a specific source of market-leading Industry Consulting, Application and Business process management, supported by the industrys most sophisticated outcome-based delivery model. All designed to be the Digital Reinvention partner for leading clients across the world - providing value-led and asset-powered end to end solutions. With a global footprint in over countries, we are empowering clients to build upon their tremendous heritage in Application Innovation processes and also transform them to a Cloud, Cognitive and Social centric world. With skills across six sectors and industries, all major service lines and competencies, IBM’s GBS is a promising business unit in itself to be a part of. Through our unique global delivery network; IBM offers global expertise coupled with a deep understanding of local capabilities, markets and cultures you could be part of and partner on some great projects with some of the best corporations in the world across geographies. Our IBM and Salesforce strategic partnerships strengthens and delivers new solutions to enterprise customers using IBM Cloud and Watson services with Salesforce Quip and Salesforce Service Cloud Einstein. Together we deliver solutions that bring together the power of AI and enable companies to make smarter decisions, faster than ever before. Your day in the role will include... You will design, develop and support application solutions with focus on SAP Netweaver - ABAP. You may also design, develop and/or re-engineer highly complex application components and integrate software packages, programs and reusable objects residing on multiple platforms. You will come with... Knowledge and experience on SAP Workflow Advance ABAP BADI (Business Add-In) Intermediate Document Extensions ABAP Objects Business Application Programming Interface XI (Exchange Infrastructure) How we’ll help you grow: You’ll have access to all the technical and management training courses to become the expert you want to be You’ll learn directly from experienced developers in the field, our team leads love to mentor You have the opportunity to work in many different areas to figure out what really excites you Required Technical and Professional Expertise 6+ years of experience required. The ABAP on HANA Application Developers would possess the knowledge of the following topics and apply them to bring in value and innovation to client engagements: SAP HANA Technical Concept and Architecture, Data Modelling using HANA Studio, ABAP Development Tools (ADT), Code Performance Rules and Guidelines for SAP HANA, ADBC, Native SQL, ABAP Core data Services, Data Base Procedures, Text Search, ALV on HANA, and HANA Live models consumption. Designing and developing, data dictionary objects, data elements, domains, structures, views, lock objects, search helps and in formatting the output of SAP documents with multiple options. Modifying standard layout sets in SAP Scripts, Smart forms and Adobe Forms Knowledge on ABAP Object Oriented Programming. Development experience in RICEF (Reports, Interfaces, Conversions, Enhancements, Forms and Reports) Preferred Tech and Prof Experience Experience in working in Implementation, Upgrade, Maintenance and Post Production support projects would be an advantage Understanding of SAP functional requirement, conversion into Technical design and development using ABAP Language for Report, Interface, Conversion, Enhancement and Forms in implementation or support projects EO Statement IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

page.job_description: Primary Location: India,Maharashtra,Mumbai Education: Bachelors Degree Job Function: Compliance and Control Schedule: Full-time Shift: Day Job Employee Status: Regular Travel Time: No Job ID: Description Compl Risk Mgmt Sr Analyst Serves as a Senior Compliance Risk Analyst Compliance Resourcing and Organizational Design for Independent Compliance Risk Management (ICRM) responsible for establishing internal strategies, policies, procedures, processes, and programs to prevent violations of law, rule, or regulation and design and deliver a risk management framework that maintains risk levels within the firms risk appetite and protect the franchise. In addition, engages with the ICRM product and function coverage teams, in order to partner to develop and apply CRM program solutions that meet business and customer needs in a manner consistent with the Citi program framework. This role reports to the ICRM Global Process Owner for Organizational Design (OD). Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. Thats why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures. SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because its the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve peoples lives. As THE cloud company powered by SAP HANA, SAP is a market leader in enterprise application software, helping companies of all sizes and industries Run Simple. We empower people and organizations to work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. SAP applications and services enable our customers to operate profitably, adapt continuously, and grow sustainably. At SAP, we believe in the power of collaboration and empower our employees to perform at their best in an environment that encourages free and open expression of ideas. Here, you work alongside creative thinkers who share your interests, while turning big ideas into reality for our customers. With innovative job training, mentors to help you grow, and the flexibility to balance your work and personal life, youre able to build your career. Its no wonder that some of the sharpest minds from around the world are working for a company that is consistently recognized as a global top employer. PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES There is hardly any business area unaffected by the Big Data wave, but customers struggle with a broad adoption due to the complexity of solutions and lack of guidance from trusted suppliers. Most of the enterprise big data projects are standalone silos with limited link into corporate structure. But as the technology gets more and more enterprise ready it is vital to connect them with corporate data governed e.g. in a data warehouse. It can be expected that architectures will need to combine big data systems with core business applications. Therefore data warehousing technology is under pressure to integrate efficiently with the Big Data scenarios and to provide features and functions to handle this new data and transform it into value. The team answers to this challenge and build - SAP Data Hub that delivers a comprehensive logical data and analytics platform with a complete suite of fully supported, solutions and technologies that can meet the needs of even the most sophisticated and demanding modern enterpriseon-premises, in the cloud, or within any hybrid scenario. - SAP BW/4HANA , the next-generation data warehouse application which is tightly integrated with the new SAP Data Hub for all Big Data scenarios and offers a best-in-class integration with the SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) for modern, advanced analytics. SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES Proven experience in leading Product Development / Product Engineering Proven senior management skills Experience in Datawarehouse and BigData will be an added advantage WORK EXPERIENCE At least+ years of work experience with minimum 5 years in Product development in SAP or any other software development organization. Experience with leading and building high performance teams for atleast 5 years EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS Be a People leader and Technology leader for the team Drive the strategy and delivery of the owned areas Stakeholder management Customer engagement WHAT YOU GET FROM US Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If youre searching for a company thats dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment apply now. SAPS DIVERSITY COMMITMENT To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company. SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. What will I be doing? As a Demi Chef de Partie, you will be responsible for preparing and presenting high quality dishes to deliver an excellent Guest and Member experience. A Demi Chef de Partie will also be required to assist with food cost controls. Specifically, you will be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards: Prepare and present high quality dishes within company guidelines Keep all working areas clean and tidy and ensure no cross contamination Prepare all mis-en-place for all relevant menus Assist in positive outcomes from guest queries in a timely and efficient manner Ensure food stuffs are of a good quality and stored correctly Contribute to controlling costs, improving gross profit margins, and other departmental and financial targets Assist other departments wherever necessary and maintain good working relationships Report maintenance, hygiene and hazard issues Comply with hotel security, fire regulations and all health and safety and food safety legislation Awareness departmental targets and strive to achieve them as part of the team Be environmentally aware
